column1: 23164,Wolverine: Manifest Destiny (2008) #4,4,27089,63,"Last time Wolverine tangled with the four mystical warriors of the Black Dragon Death Squad, it very nearly cost him his life. But this time he's got some help, as every kung fu school in Chinatown unites behind him-including the reunited Sons of the Tiger! But at what price will come victory? And what dark decision will Wolverine be forced to make? ,2009,2
